#nametype [nametype]: 142
The Fir Bolg Druids are usually reclusive and bitter fellows who still long for a Fir Bolg kingdom of their own. The Druids are not as powerful as they once were, but they try to keep the remnants of their Nemedian legacy alive, and the magic powers that come with it.
